tool_description: Resolves and validates DOI identifiers, retrieving associated metadata and checking DOI accessibility and correctness.

doi_list.description: Array of DOI strings to resolve and validate

fetch_metadata.description: Whether to retrieve full metadata for valid DOIs

check_accessibility.description: Whether to verify DOI link accessibility

error_messages: Empty DOI list: Provide at least one DOI for resolution.
Invalid DOI format: One or more DOIs do not follow standard DOI format (10.xxxx/xxxx).
Network error: Unable to connect to DOI resolution services.
Resolution timeout: DOI resolution request timed out.
usage: Submit DOI strings to verify their validity, resolve metadata, and check accessibility. Results include validation status and retrieved information.

metadata_retrieved.description: Number of DOIs with successfully retrieved metadata
